name: 2021 The 14th International Conference on Computer Science and Information Technology
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted papers of ICCSIT 2021 after proper registration and presentation will be published in one of the following international journals: Journal of Communications(JCM, 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) | DOI: 10.12720/jcm -Abstracting/Indexing: SCOPUS; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; etc. International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing(IJMLC, ISSN: 2010-3700 (Online) | DOI: 10.18178/IJMLC)- Abstracting/Indexing: Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library. Journal of Software(JSW, ISSN: 1796-217X(Online))- Abstracting/ Indexing: DBLP, EBSCO, ProQuest, INSPEC, ULRICH's Periodicals Directory, WorldCat, etc. Journal of Image and Graphics(JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699 (Print) | DOI: 10.18178/joig)- Abstracting/ Indexing: Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
